titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: MULTI-PROFESSIONAL OR MULTI-DISCIPLINARY INDICATION CODE (PAYMENT BY RESULTS) - Description

div.p: MULTI-PROFESSIONAL OR MULTI-DISCIPLINARY INDICATION CODE (PAYMENT BY RESULTS) Â is the same as attribute MULTI-PROFESSIONAL OR MULTI-DISCIPLINARY INDICATION CODE.

p.b: This data item is included in Commissioning Data Set version 6-2, but should not be submitted until further development by the Department of Health has been undertaken.
